lines.text: You've got loads of cops on the scene, right? Have any of them found some clues?
Not much. They figured out how he got into the building- broke a window- but he didn't leave a lot of other evidence.
And just to be sure: this guy isn't a cop who accidentally wandered into a burning room, right?
Like, he's got a gun, so...
Hey. Steelspeaker. Are all your girls accounted for?
...Uh-huh. Okay. Over. Jude, you don't have any missing plainclothes officers?
Captain Wirebrush? I need you to check...
He goes on like this for a few minutes.
Nothing. Every officer who might've been on the scene is accounted for.
Meaning this guy's here for some other reason.
